title: New: DIIIII – Winters
body:
Seventy six seconds isn’t really much to judge an artist on, especially when said minute and a quarter is the very first outing from them.

**DIIIII’s** _Winters_ may be short, and you get the impression slightly tongue in cheek, yet that doesn’t stop the shrill falsetto resonating elegantly, chiseling the track into more of an introduction than a full composition. As with a noticeable percentage of artists featured on CitR, there’s always the possibility that having graced us for such a short period of time, that we may never hear from them again, but in **DIIIII’s** case, we’ve got to hope that he returns.

_i live in a forest for us. you can’t seem to forgive us for the… pain._
